limitation.translation[0].definitions[0]: the act or process of controlling or reducing something
Any limitation to the king’s power could be permanent.
limitation.translation[0].definitions[1]: qualities that stop someone or something from being as good or as effective as you wish they could be
It’s a good little car, but it has its limitations.
Despite the limitations of the survey, it did suggest some general trends.
limitation.translation[0].definitions[2]: a rule or condition that stops something from increasing beyond a particular point
The new law imposes limitations on campaign contributions.
a limitation on the number of hours children can work
